product_name: The North Face GTD Tights - Men's
long_description: Whether worn alone or paired with an outer layer in cold weather, The North Face GTD tights offer excellent support and performance fabric to keep you comfortable during long training runs. VaporWick(R) fabric is designed to wick moisture and dry quickly during your high-exertion sessions. Supportive fabric keeps hard-working muscles comfortable. Back-of-the-knee mesh panels enhance breathability. Silver-salt treatment at gusset fights odors. Elastic waist with drawstring ensures a comfortable fit. Fabric protects skin from the sun with a UPF rating of 50+. Need to stash some extra fuel for that last mile? A rear zippered pocket holds small items. Calf zippers make dressing over shoes easy. The North Face GTD tights feature reflective highlights that increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Whether worn alone or paired with an outer layer in cold weather, The North Face GTD tights offer excellent support and performance fabric to keep you comfortable during long training runs.
